nodes.bodyText: This step and the one below don't invoke the Maven integration tests, so no need to cache .m2 here.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -101,6 +165,15 @@ jobs:
     if: github.event_name == 'push' && github.repository == 'junit-team/junit5' && (startsWith(github.ref, 'refs/heads/releases/') || github.ref == 'refs/heads/main')
     steps:
     - uses: actions/checkout@v2
+    - name: Cache Gradle wrapper and dependencies

nodes.bodyText: Shouldn't this also include buildSrc/**, gradle/**, and gradle.properties?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -23,6 +23,22 @@ jobs:
     container: "junitteam/build:${{ matrix.jdk }}"
     steps:
       - uses: actions/checkout@v2
+      - name: Cache Gradle wrapper and dependencies
+        uses: actions/cache@v2
+        with:
+          path: |
+            ~/.gradle/caches/
+            ~/.gradle/wrapper/dists
+          key: ${{ runner.os }}-gradle-${{ hashFiles('**/*.gradle*') }}

nodes.bodyText: Good point, I've expanded the list.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -23,6 +23,22 @@ jobs:
     container: "junitteam/build:${{ matrix.jdk }}"
     steps:
       - uses: actions/checkout@v2
+      - name: Cache Gradle wrapper and dependencies
+        uses: actions/cache@v2
+        with:
+          path: |
+            ~/.gradle/caches/
+            ~/.gradle/wrapper/dists
+          key: ${{ runner.os }}-gradle-${{ hashFiles('**/*.gradle*') }}
